Mindful-tube - Distraction-Free YouTube Client
Link to website or a demo. / repo

Mindful-tube

Mindful-tube is a minimalist web app designed to provide a distraction-free YouTube viewing experience. As the frontend developer, I created a clean, user-focused interface that allows users to watch specific videosâ€”like tutorials or shared linksâ€”without being pulled into YouTubeâ€™s recommendation spiral. Built with Next.js and TailwindCSS, the app ensures a fast, intuitive, and focused experience.

ğŸŒŸ Project Overview

Mindful-tube addresses the common issue of losing time to YouTubeâ€™s endless recommendations (with average mobile sessions lasting 40 minutes). Users can paste a video URL, watch it in a streamlined interface, and return to their tasks without distractions. The appâ€™s lightweight design and modular components make it an efficient tool for productivity-focused viewing.

âœ¨ Key Features

  • Distraction-Free Viewing: Removes YouTubeâ€™s recommendations, sidebars, and unrelated content.
  • Simple Interface: Paste a URL and watch instantly with minimal navigation.
  • Responsive Design: Optimized for desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.
  • Fast Performance: Leverages Next.js for quick load times and smooth playback.
  • Minimalist Aesthetic: Clean, modern UI built with TailwindCSS for a focused experience.

ğŸ› ï¸ My Contributions

As the frontend developer, I was responsible for:

  • Building the app using Next.js, utilizing its routing and static generation for a lightweight, performant experience.
  • Designing a minimalist and responsive UI with TailwindCSS, ensuring a distraction-free and visually cohesive interface across devices.
  • Integrating react-youtube for seamless YouTube video playback, maintaining a streamlined player without external distractions.
  • Creating modular components to ensure maintainability and reusability, aligning with modern frontend best practices.
  • Optimizing performance with Next.js features like static site generation and efficient rendering, enhancing user focus and speed.
  • Ensuring accessibility by adhering to web standards, making the app usable for diverse audiences.

The result is a sleek, purpose-driven app that empowers users to stay productive while watching YouTube content.

ğŸ§° Tech Stack

  • Framework: Next.js
  • Styling: TailwindCSS
  • Video Playback: react-youtube

ğŸ“‹ Third-Party Libraries

  • react-youtube: Simplifies YouTube video embedding with a lightweight, customizable player (react-youtube).
